ENGLISH: No...\| not you...\| It couldn't be...?\| The prophecy is unraveling...\| Uaaaaagggh!!!\|\|\^
ZH-cn: 你……\|怎么是你……\|怎么可能……？\|正如预言所说……\|呃啊啊啊啊！！！\|\|\^

ENGLISH: Yes.\| It's good to be back, Stefan.\|\|\|\|\^
ZH-cn: 是我。\|很高兴回来，斯泰凡。\|\|\|\|\^

ENGLISH: ...\| \n[8]???\! Why do I see \n[8]...\| Have I perished...?
Not quite.\! You're doing pretty well, you'll find.
ZH-cn: 没呢。\!你会发现你活的好好的。

ENGLISH: What the...\| have you lost yer mind, \n[8]?!!  ...\| Wait a minute...
Nice trick.\! You should probably do it again.
ZH-cn: 花招不错。\!你应该再来一遍。

ENGLISH: \n[8], I have questions...\| a chat, please?
No more running, no more hiding.\! The lines are drawn and the enemy has played his hand.\! Casamir... the Nephilim have arrived, and we're coming for you.
ZH-cn: 我们不会再逃离，不会再躲藏。\!战斗已经开始，敌人已经亮出手牌。\!圣灵已经降临。卡萨米尔……我们来找你算账了。
